title: How to clean obfuscated code from fake if statements?
content:
I am trying to deobfuscate javascript code. Firstly I extracted strings from big array. Then I saw many parts like this

There is only one line of code which makes sense. Is there any Node.js cleaner package exists?

answers_data.content:
I found a solution.
Gist with Node.js code.
